title: @Riot Thanks for uploading Champion spotlight music
body: That's all, been waiting on this for a long time. Also, please add a download link thanks!

replies.body:
I've updated the Soundcloud page with download links. Sorry you had to wait so long for us to get these out :/ 

For anyone else looking for this music, you can find a link to the set [here](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/sets/champion-spotlight), and you can access the download link by hovering over the individual track names.
